Html:
Is there a way that I can make all cell content padding larger so that my rows are spaced out more?

I would like to be able to do this for all cells in the Grid. 

I have tried setting a default cell style, but the padding property is not used in the template it seems, so the is not padding. 
I have also tried setting the row padding property in the default style but this leads to the same problem.

Next I tried setting the Element style on the column, and this worked, but the problem is I would have to do that for each of the columns I make. I can't make a default style for the DataGridBoundColumn becuase it is not a FrameworkElement. 

I need to be able to do this padding without specifying it each column declaration, as this grid is in a base class window and we want as much abstraction as we can get. 

Any ideas?

Thanks,
Evan
